actionConfirm.title: Confirmation
actionConfirm.content: Are you sure you want to perform this action?

nav.billingTooltip: Your account must be approved to access billing

approve.companyNameCaption: Or, if you are an individual, your full name.
approve.typeOfContentCaption: What type of content do you plan to have on your newsletter?
approve.typeOfContentPlaceholder: Weekly insights about tech, AI, and startups
approve.frequencyCaption: How many newsletter issues do you plan to send per month?
approve.existingListCaption: Do you already have an email list that you wish to import? If yes, how did you obtain it? How many subscribers are there?
approve.sampleCaption: Link to a sample email or past newsletter archive, if available.
approve.whyPostCaption: Completely optional. Our team would love to know why you chose Hyvor Post.
approve.checkbox1: I agree that Hyvor Post does not allow sending unsolicited emails or cold emails, and every subscriber must have opted in to receive emails.
approve.checkbox2: I agree to the <termsLink>Terms of Service</termsLink> and <privacyLink>Privacy Policy</privacyLink> of Hyvor Post.
approve.checkboxRequired: You must agree to the terms and conditions
approve.submittedForApproval: Your information has been submitted for approval.
approve.error: An error occurred while submitting your information. Please try again.
approve.pendingNotice: Your account must be approved by our team before sending newsletters. Please fill out the following form, and we will review it within 24 hours.
approve.markedAsPendingNotice: Your approval request has been marked as pending by our team. You may update your information and resubmit for approval.
approve.reviewNotice: Your approval request is currently under review. You may make any changes and resubmit if you need to update your information. The review will be completed within 24 hours.
approve.rejectNotice: Your approval request has been rejected. Please contact support for any further clarifications.

domains.firstDomain: Add a domain to send newsletters from your own domain.

usage.title: Usage
usage.licenseDoesNotIncludeEmails: Your current license does not include sending emails

billing.approvalRequired: Your account must be approved to create a subscription.

lists.tooltip: Lists are used to group subscribers. You can send issues to one or more lists.

bulk.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete these subscribers?
bulk.statusUpdateConfirm: Are you sure you want to change the status to {status}?
bulk.selectAllWarning: You can only select up to {count} subscribers at once

draft.subject: Subject
draft.listsEmptyError: Please select at least one list
draft.sendableSubscribersCount: {count} {count, plural, one {subscriber} other {subscribers}} will receive this issue
draft.fromEmailCaption: Your subscribers will see this email address as the sender of the newsletter.

sendingLimitReached.title: Sending Limit Reached
sendingLimitReached.message: You have reached your sending limit of {currentLimit} emails and this issue would exceed the limit by {exceedAmount} emails. Please upgrade your plan to send to more subscribers.

sendingProfile.title: Sending Profile
sendingProfile.default: This is the default sending profile.

testEmail.title: Send Test Email
testEmail.description: Ready to send your issue? Try sending a test email first to see how it looks in your inbox.

emailValidation.emailNotAllowed: The email must be from a newsletter user or a newsletter owner verified domain.

confirm.sentMultiple: Test email successfully sent for {count} addresses

draft.approveBeforeSending: Your account must be approved to send issues.
draft.subscriptionBeforeSending: You must have a valid subscription to send issues.

sendIssue.title: Send Issue Confirmation
sendIssue.content: You are about to send this newsletter issue. Are you sure you want to send this? Please double-check everything before sending as you cannot undo this action.

validate.subject: Subject is required
validate.lists: At least one list is required

delete.title: Delete Issue
delete.content: Are you sure you want to delete this issue?

form.title: Title
form.subscribeButtonTextCaption: Text shown on the subscribe button
form.textColorCaption: Used for most texts in the form
form.roundnessCaption: Roundness of edges of the input, button, etc.

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.name: Newsletter Name
newsletter.subdomainCaption: Used for the archive site and the system sending email
newsletter.deleteContent: Are you sure you want to delete this project? This action cannot be undone.

sendingProfiles.title: Sending Profiles
sendingProfiles.setAsDefaultContent: Are you sure you want to set this sending profile as the default? This will be used to send all future issues unless changed.
sendingProfiles.deleteSendingProfileContent: Are you sure you want to delete this sending profile?

api.title: API Keys
api.deleteKey: Are you sure you want to delete the API key {name}?
api.warningNotice: Important: This is the only time you'll see this API key. Make sure to copy it and store it securely.
api.name: Name
api.nameCaption: A descriptive name to identify this API key
api.keyCaption: Invalidate old key and generate a new one
api.regenerateTitle: Are you sure you want to regenerate the API Key
api.regenerateContent: This will invalidate the old key and generate a new one. Make sure to update your existing keys with the new key.
api.scopesCaption: Select what actions this API key can perform
api.nameCharLimit: Name must be less than 255 characters
api.scopesRequired: At least one scope is required
api.statusCaption: Enable or disable this API key

metadata.displayNameCaption: Shown in the Console and custom form fields
metadata.deleteContent: Are you sure you want to delete this metadata? This metadata will be removed from all subscribers. This action cannot be undone.

users.title: Users
users.askAdmin: Ask your admin to <signup>create a HYVOR account</signup> before inviting.
users.usernameCaption: Username or email of the admin's HYVOR account
users.waitBeforeResend: Please wait a minute before resending an invite
users.deleteInviteContent: Are you sure you want to delete this invite?
users.removeAdminContent: Are you sure you want to remove this admin?

userInvite.subject: You have been invited to join {newsletterName}
userInvite.text: You have been invited to join {newsletterName} as a {role}. Please click the button below to accept the invitation.
userInvite.footerText: Once you join, you will be able to access the Hyvor Post Console for this project using your HYVOR account.

domainVerification.subject: Your domain {domain} is verified
domainVerification.text: Your domain {domain} is verified. You can now use it with your Hyvor Post projects.

approvalReviewing.subject: Your Hyvor Post approval request is under review

approval.subject: Your Hyvor Post account has been {status}
approval.bodyApproved: We're happy to inform you that your Hyvor Post account has been approved. Now you can upgrade your account to a paid plan and start sending emails via Hyvor Post.
approval.bodyRejected: We regret to inform you that your Hyvor Post account approval request has been rejected.
approval.footerText: If you have any questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to contact our support team by replying to this email.
